A.formula: select case when k.levelelcommittee ilike 'district' then round(COALESCE(f.SUMFINUIK,0)+COALESCE(f.SUMFINTIKCEN,0),2) when k.levelelcommittee ilike 'territory' or k.levelelcommittee ilike 'circuit' then round(COALESCE(f.SUMFINTIK,0)+COALESCE((select case when t.numbestimate ilike '%апу%' then f.SUMFINTIKCEN else 0 end),0),2) end from FINANCEELCOM f, ELECTCOMMINCAMP e, ELECTCOMMITTEE k, TYPEEXP t where f.TYPEEXPID = @TYPEEXPID and f.ELECTCOMMINCAMPID = @ELECTCOMMINCAMPID and e.ID = f.ELECTCOMMINCAMPID and k.ID = e.ELECTCOMMITTEEID and t.ID = f.TYPEEXPID

A.name: Приход
A.caption: Приход
A.formula: select sum(COALESCE(r.INCOMECASH,0)) from REPORTCASHBOOKSSPEC r where r.REPORTCASHBOOKSID = @ID

A.name: Расход
A.caption: Расход
A.formula: select sum(COALESCE(r.EXPENDCASH,0)) from REPORTCASHBOOKSSPEC r where r.REPORTCASHBOOKSID = @ID

A.name: Остаток на конец дня
A.caption: Остаток на конец дня
A.formula: COALESCE(@OPENBALANCE,0) + (select sum(COALESCE(r.INCOMECASH,0)) from REPORTCASHBOOKSSPEC r where r.REPORTCASHBOOKSID = @ID) - (select sum(COALESCE(r.EXPENDCASH,0)) from REPORTCASHBOOKSSPEC r where r.REPORTCASHBOOKSID = @ID)

A.name: Отчет
A.caption: Отчет
A.formula: select case when @COUNTSHEETS = 1 then '1' when @COUNTSHEETS > 1 then '2' end

A.formula: select case when @PERSONID is null then 'Выдача денег из кассы подотчетным лицам' when COALESCE(@INCOMECASH,0) > 0 then (select COALESCE(p.rodsurname,'')||' '||COALESCE(p.rodfirstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(p.rodmiddlename,'') from person p where p.id = @PERSONID) when COALESCE(@EXPENDCASH,0) > 0 then (select COALESCE(p.datsurname,'')||' '||COALESCE(p.datfirstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(p.datmiddlename,'') from person p where p.id = @PERSONID) end

A.name: Блокировка записей
A.caption: Блокировка записей
A.formula: select case when (select count( li.keyin) + count(lo.keyout) from INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_CHANGE c left join INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_DICNOMNS d on d.id = c.INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_DICNOMNSID left join INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCEDOCS s on s.id = d. INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCEDOCSID left join INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE i on i.id = s.INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCEID left join doclinks li on c.id = li.keyin left join doclinks lo on c.id = lo.keyout where i.id=@id and ( li.tablein='INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_CHANGE' or lo.tableout='INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_CHANGE')) = 0 then true else false end

INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCEDOCSID left join doclinks li on c.id = li.keyin left join doclinks lo on c.id = lo.keyout where s.id=@id and ( li.tablein='INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_CHANGE' or lo.tableout='INVENTORY_TRIAL_BALANCE_CHANGE')) = 0 then true else false end
